typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EquipmentGroup as string,
		EquipmentComponent as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadCreateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponents
ReadCreateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponents select(mapColumn(
		{$sourceId} = EquipmentGroup,
		{$targetId} = EquipmentComponent),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$relationshipName} = 'Group_contains_EquipmentComponent',
	{$relationshipDelete} = 'false',
	{$relationshipId} = {$sourceId} + 'to' + {$targetId}) ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_EquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponents.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		EquipmentGroup as string,
		EquipmentComponent as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
ReadCreateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponents select(mapColumn(
		EquipmentGroup,
		EquipmentComponent),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor union(byName: true)~> StatusUpdateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
StatusUpdateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponents_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateEquipmentGroupsEquipmentComponentsStatusEditor
